arStrings.szText: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds while above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]%{/c} Life, {c_important}Core{/c} Skills cost {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life instead of your Primary Resource. Skills that consume Life deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]%{/c} increased damage.
